description: 综合运用一般现在时的各种形式：肯定句、否定句、疑问句和频率副词

basic_rules: 综合运用一般现在时的各种形式
能够正确使用肯定句、否定句、疑问句
能够正确使用频率副词
能够在实际语境中灵活运用
usage_cases: 描述日常习惯：I always brush my teeth before bed.
表达喜好：I like apples, but I don't like vegetables.
询问信息：Do you like music? Yes, I do.
表达频率：She usually goes to school by bus.
common_errors: He don't like apples. (错误) → He doesn't like apples. (正确)
Do he like music? (错误) → Does he like music? (正确)
He always is happy. (错误) → He is always happy. (正确)
usage_tips: 注意第三人称单数的变化
否定句和疑问句中动词用原形
频率副词的位置要正确

comprehensive: I always get up at 7:00 every day.
She usually goes to school by bus, but she doesn't like walking.
Do you like music? Yes, I do. I often listen to music.
He never eats meat, but he sometimes eats fish.
We don't usually watch TV on weekdays, but we often watch on weekends.
conversation: A: Do you like apples? B: Yes, I do. I always eat apples.
A: Does she play football? B: No, she doesn't. She never plays football.
A: Do they study hard? B: Yes, they do. They usually study in the evening.
A: Does he like coffee? B: No, he doesn't. He never drinks coffee.
mixed_forms: I like music, but I don't like loud music.
She usually studies English, but she sometimes studies Chinese.
Do you often play football? Yes, I do. I often play on weekends.
He doesn't usually watch TV, but he sometimes watches movies.

templates.answer: Yes, I do. / No, I don't.

templates.answer: Yes, he does. / No, he doesn't.
